name: BITSYTALE version 1.1.1
description:
BITSYTALE is my first ever public bitsy Hd game. I know it's not that good, but it's meant to be for a significant build-up for my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBYb1zlFHD0rsS42a_D7XuA

If anyone has any theories link to the youtube video or write it out in my comment section of the trailer!

ImDoinItWell, I hope you are too!
